question: 感染
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>feeling</kanji> of <kanji>dye</kanji>, covering your body, is the feeling of nasty germs and diseases penetrating your skin, getting inside of you. This is an <vocabulary>infection</vocabulary>, and it's gross.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
